reviews.title: Excellent resource of info
reviews.comment: Fast, clear and well put together. Kept up to date with the latest information and patches. Well worth it
reviews.author: Stephen Pearse

reviews.title: Best app out there!
reviews.comment: Well put together, clear, informative. Great stuff!
reviews.author: Pablo Mhanna-Sandoval

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Very user friendly and neat app. If only the download of files for the 3D models could be a smaller file but other than that a 5 star app!!!
reviews.author: Russell Jake Schooling

reviews.title: Good but heavy
reviews.comment: Works well and shows loads of extra info that is hidden inthe game itself.. only downside is that after the app download there is another part to download, it is optional, but it is the best part.. with the penetration models of each tank.
reviews.author: Alessandro Buscaglione

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Lots of useful info and options. Like the ability to compare tanks.  Only issue is that it force closes on exit. casio commando
reviews.author: Jon Jenson

reviews.title: That Amazing
reviews.comment: Very very helpful. Thx for good app. User friendly.
reviews.author: Pheerawat Nanna

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Great detail was put into this.  Great to have open before and during battle.  Would be great if you could explore maps.
reviews.author: Rod Krzywicki

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome app, easy to use. Handy when your playing :-). Love how you can see where you can penetrate and where you cant.  Also high detailed information that you would find in-game.  AWESOME
reviews.author: D Hanksie

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This is the first time i\'m rating and commenting some android app, because i simply had to... Amount of data and work put in this app is amazing. It goes beyond Wot, it\'s perfect!
reviews.author: Vladimir Petrovic

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This app comes in handy when i\'m trying to decide what line to go down when i\'m not near a computer. It\'s awesome. Five stars easy.
reviews.author: Fernando Lopez

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: useful and fun for wot fans. especially on long boring road trips
reviews.author: Jonathan Purgason

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Great app..  Could do with a data audit of tank information as there is some duplication..  But that is being seriously picky!!
reviews.author: Peter Bailey

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Brilliant app will help those have just started playing and those veterans aswell. .
reviews.author: dave woodward

reviews.title: Exactly what\'s needed
reviews.comment: This app shows you everything you need to know when playing wot in a neat, categorized manner. Just awesomeness
reviews.author: Bob Mossink

reviews.title: Awesome App that replaces the Wiki
reviews.comment: I think that the app helped me in knowing the tank characteristics in terms of the statistic of the armor gun, makes thing easier. Don\'t need to go Wiki anymore!
reviews.author: HaLaMe VeNoMsLaYeR

reviews.title: Just what every Commander needs
reviews.comment: Just what I wanted, using on both my nexus 4 and tablet I can in real time check everything I need to know about every single tank and how to combat it!
reviews.author: Adam Noble

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great app, amazing content. Only bad point is the excessive download time for the 3D content. Small bug with the armor piercer where, at an angle, there is a small piece of the T1\'s armor that can bounce a shot from a Maus at 0m, although I respect the fact the 3D content is in Beta stage. Still, it\'s an app to keep.
reviews.author: Rui Mathias

reviews.title: Very helpful information, especially the penetration 3D models
reviews.comment: Definitely a very good app for wot players. The penetration possibilities and armor thickness from varied angles is really nice!
reviews.author: Jeno Snetrem

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This app has everything, I have not seen any problems, worth the five stars
reviews.author: Chris R
